Essential Commands./setup: Instructions on setting up the bot
Essential Commands./unfollow: Stop receiving tweets from a user
Essential Commands./get-follows: Show all followed users and their settings
Essential Commands./unfollow-all: Stop receiving tweets from all users

Webhook Commands./set-webhook: Set the webhook where tweets will be received
Webhook Commands./remove-webhook: Removes the webhook where tweets are received

Other Commands./ping: Pong! Tests the bots response time
